About Me

I am an aspiring Data Scientist pursuing a Masterâ€™s in Data Science at the University of Maryland. With expertise in machine learning, statistical modeling, and big data systems, I am passionate about solving complex problems and driving impactful decisions through data, with a specific interest in computer vision applications.

At Optum Global Solutions , I implemented machine learning models and automated workflows, reducing processing time by 40% and increasing throughput by 32%. My work included PaaS modules, NLP-based automation, and a patented image similarity model for form processing.

My technical toolkit includes Python, SQL, Scikit-Learn, TensorFlow, and cloud platforms like AWS and Azure. I have experience deploying scalable solutions and deriving actionable insights, particularly in computer vision tasks such as OCR-based text extraction and image analysis.

I aim to leverage my skills and passion for computer vision to deliver impactful solutions that optimize processes, enhance user experiences, and drive innovation.

Professional experience

March 2023 - June 2024
1 year 4 months

Data Scientist, Optum Global Solutions

Developed and deployed machine learning models for automated data extraction and templated form processing, achieving a 40% reduction in processing time and a 32% increase in throughput. Patented an image similarity model for enhanced form processing accuracy. Leveraged NLP techniques such as semantic analysis, table extraction, and edge detection to deliver modular services. Achieved a 96% accuracy rate and 42% faster processing for non-templated document matching using MPNet transformers.

July 2021 - March 2023
1 year 9 months

Associate Software Engineer II, Optum Global Solutions

Designed and implemented OCR-based text matching and edge data extraction modules with validation and auto-correction. Optimized code efficiency, reducing processing time from 1 minute to 30 seconds and increasing system capacity from 5 to 24 files per minute through concurrency and load balancing. Integrated a Layout Parser, achieving 87% accuracy on Doclaynet for document structure analysis.
